title: Market basket prices double, index value doubles

content.question: Suppose that the consumer price index rises from 100 to 200. From this information we may conclude that

choices.label: each person’s real income is cut in half
the prices in an average consumer’s market basket are doubled
all consumer goods prices are doubled
all prices in the economy are doubled

content.answer: the prices in an average consumer’s market basket are doubled
